org.epochx.stats
Class StatsUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.epochx.stats.StatsUtils

public final class StatsUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains static utility methods for the generation or use of statistics.

Method Detail

ave

public static double ave(double... values)
Calculates and returns the mean average of an array of double. The provided argument must not be null nor an empty array.

Parameters:
values - an array of doubles to calculate the mean average of.
Returns:
the mean average of the provided array of doubles.

ave

public static double ave(int... values)
Calculates and returns the mean average of an array of int. The provided argument must not be null nor an empty array.

Parameters:
values - an array of int to calculate the mean average of.
Returns:
the mean average of the provided array of int.

public static double stdev(double... values)
Calculates and returns the standard deviation of an array of double. The provided argument must not be null nor an empty array.

Parameters:
values - an array of doubles to calculate the standard deviation of.
Returns:
the standard deviation of the provided array of doubles.

stdev

public static double stdev(double[] values,
                           double ave)
Calculates and returns the standard deviation of an array of double. The provided valuesargument must not be null nor an empty array. The ave argument supplies the mean average of the values if it is known to save calculating it again.

Parameters:
values - an array of doubles to calculate the standard deviation of.
ave - the mean average of the values.
Returns:
the standard deviation of the provided array of doubles.

stdev

Calculates and returns the standard deviation of an array of int. The provided argument must not be null nor an empty array.

Parameters:
values - an array of int to calculate the standard deviation of.
Returns:
the standard deviation of the provided array of ints.

Calculates and returns the standard deviation of an array of int. The provided valuesargument must not be null nor an empty array. The ave argument supplies the mean average of the values if it is known to save calculating it again.

Parameters:
values - an array of int to calculate the standard deviation of.
ave - the mean average of the values.
Returns:
the standard deviation of the provided array of ints.

ci95

public static double ci95(double... values)
Calculates and returns the 95% confidence interval of an array of double. The returned value represents an interval so the actual interval is +/- the returned value either side of the mean. The provided valuesargument must not be null nor an empty array.

Parameters:
values - an array of double to calculate the 95% confidence interval for.
Returns:
the confidence interval either side of the mean for the provided array of doubles.

ci95

public static double ci95(double[] values,
                          double stdev)
Calculates and returns the 95% confidence interval of an array of double. The returned value represents an interval so the actual interval is +/- the returned value either side of the mean. The provided valuesargument must not be null nor an empty array. The stdev argument supplies the standard deviation of the values if it is known to save calculating it again.

Parameters:
values - an array of double to calculate the 95% confidence interval for.
stdev - the standard deviation of the values.
Returns:
the confidence interval either side of the mean for the provided array of doubles.

ci95

public static double ci95(int... values)

ci95

public static double ci95(int[] values,
                          double stdev)
Calculates and returns the 95% confidence interval of an array of int. The returned value represents an interval so the actual interval is +/- the returned value either side of the mean. The provided valuesargument must not be null nor an empty array. The stdev argument supplies the standard deviation of the values if it is known to save calculating it again.

Parameters:
values - an array of int to calculate the 95% confidence interval for.
stdev - the standard deviation of the values.
Returns:
the confidence interval either side of the mean for the provided array of ints.
